CAREER OBJECTIVES:-
Seeking a challenging, result-oriented and growth offering opportunity in the field of mechanical
engineering, where I can use my ability of study & experience & become an integral part of the
team to achieve organization objectives.
PROFESSIONAL QUALIFICATIONS:- B.Tech (Mechanical) from Uttarakhand technical university with an aggregate of 6 2% in 2017.
ACADEMIC QUALIFICATIONS :- High School (10th) from Bihar board with an aggregate of 52 .3% in 2011.
Intermediate (12th) from UP board with an aggregate of 83.2% in 2013.
PROJECTS / SEMINARS UNDERTAKEN :-  Model Automated guided vehical as B.Tech Final Year Project.
INTERNSHIP/WORK EXPERIENCE :- Seven weeks summer vocational training in Bharat Heavy Electricals Limited (BHEL), Haridwar
(UK) in June 2016.
Six months experience as mechanical engg in Revel evermantal solutions Roorkee. . Maintained and serviced HAVC systems and refrigeration equipment . . Installed refrigeration system and tested them for proper operation. . Analyzed,Modified,and repaired digital control systems.

Active Participant of various literary & cultural activities of the college and university.
Participated in general quiz and got 1st prize during Annual fest at college level. Captain of swimming team at college level during year 2013-17.HOBBIES:-
